name: Delivery Manager (dxFeed)
description:
dxFeed is the leading provider of data services for the Capital Markets industry, sourcing and storing direct market data feeds from a variety of exchanges and market participants around the world, having built one of the most comprehensive ticker plants, in addition to offering the broadest range of data services for streaming, consolidation, storage, extraction, analytics, including index construction and maintenance for buy-side and sell-side institutions of the global financial industry.

We are looking for experienced Delivery Manager to join our distributed cross-functional team. We are focusing on the development of the high performance backend systems providing solutions in the field of financial technology combining expertise in software development and mathematics.

The dxFeed product portfolio consists of:

  • real-time, delayed, and historical tick data services
  • basic and enhanced reference data, charting aggregation streaming data, calculated data services
  • a comprehensive set of services and solutions for visualisation, analysis and surveillance of all financial data

Key Responsibilities:

  • be accountable for all dxFeed product deliveries
  • set-up and document the common delivery process
  • control the dependencies between components/products
  • take into account possible security issues
  • manages common solutions (like authorisation) implementation
  • technical understanding of the backlog and product of each team and check that it matches with the common approach
  • risks management and assessment
  • people management & increasing the team efficiency

Key Requirements:

  • caring about customer received a result that allows him to achieve his goals (Сustomer Oriented Behavior)
  • willingness to take responsibility, result-oriented mindset
  • 5+ years’ of experience in Software Development
  • strong interpersonal skills, ability to work successfully with teams and individuals across the organisation and different locations
  • very good spoken and written English (Advanced level or higher)
  • knowledge of methodologies and principles of application lifecycle management, experience with bug tracking, version control, deployment and support
  • strong experience with Linux/Unix systems
  • experience with monitoring systems and Java applications

Additional skills considered as an advantage:

  • Bachelors or Masters degree preferably in Computer Science or Engineering
  • ITIL process
  • knowledge of capital markets, financial or brokerage business
  • experience in one of role: Product Manager/Solution Architect/Resource Manager/Account Manager
  • you know how to convey plans and goals to the team
  • you can keep many different contexts in your head
